title.rendered: Blockchain Evolution: Alliance Announced between Innovation Pavilion, Cloutel, and Applicature

content.rendered:
May 14, 2018 – Applicature, a blockchain development agency, Innovation Pavilion, an incubator in Denver South, Colorado, the USA that offers space to accommodate startups of any size and stage, and Cloutel, a world-class technology service for a changing the business landscape in Denver, Colorado, the USA, have commemorated the beginning of their cooperation by signing a mutual partnership agreement.

In terms of the agreement, this new collaboration will mentor 20 companies in the next 12 months during the pre- and post-ICO period. During the cooperation, a set of marketing, promotional, and technical services will be provided for startups.

Applicature CEO Ihor Pidruchny stated: “As a mission-driven company, we are committed to help Innovation Pavilion vet and accelerate blockchain and token-based projects with technical and marketing consulting, full-cycle token sale support, and post-ICO progress.”

The partnership will be developed exclusively in Colorado. In this region, Innovation Pavilion and Cloutel will lead business discussions with prospects and clients in the fields of their services.

“The depth of expertise offered through this partnership is unprecedented,” said Sherry Akhtar, Cloutel CEO.

IP and Cloutel are excited to partner with Applicature, one of the best-qualified and most successful ICO enablement companies in the world. This three-way partnership will offer qualified pre-ICO companies a framework and roadmap to success while raising millions.

“We feel great about providing this new pathway for startup funding through such an impressive partner, and hope to leverage IP’s community activation capability,” said Vic Ahmed, Innovation Pavilion CEO.

About Innovation Pavilion

Innovation Pavilion is an ecosystem for entrepreneurs in which productive collisions lead to creative solutions. Located in the heart of Denver South, Innovation Pavilion provides an innovation hub that allows entrepreneurs of all sizes – from established companies to emerging startups – to develop creative solutions in a collaborative environment. At the Innovation Pavilion, you can tap into a full list of professional services, from executive mentoring, legal, and IT to marketing and education. You can rent a workspace, from a desk to a full office suite, take advantage of their capital investment partners, or just hang out in the Startup Lounge.

About Cloutel

Cloutel is dedicated to transforming the business landscape by making 21st-century business solutions more agile and accessible than ever before. Focusing some of the world’s top tech talent into a small and nimble boutique, Cloutel’s visionary team quickly and effectively provides clients with the customized solutions they need to leapfrog the competition.

About Applicature

Applicature, a blockchain development agency, works on projects in the blockchain industry involving the development of smart contacts, in-depth research, and the deployment and customization of blockchain solutions. Applicature is a technical advisory to blockchain companies and a technical consultancy on token sales and initial coin offerings.
